channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- C# SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- C# SDK

item.title: CVE-2018-8119|2024-08-05T06:46:13.225Z -- microsoft -- c%23%20sdk
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when the Azure IoT Device Provisioning AMQP Transport library improperly validates certificates over the AMQP protocol, aka "Azure IoT SDK Spoofing Vulnerability." This affects C# SDK, C SDK, Java SDK.
